metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3078 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 25.0.0.171 and earlier have an exploitablememory corruption vulnerability in the Adobe Texture Format (ATF) module.Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.126ubuntu0.16.04.1').
